we value your privacywe and our 153 partners will store and access information on your device with your consent. browsing data is collected through the use of cookies to process personal data. you can adjust your preferences by clicking on the 'show purposes' button. you can adjust your choices at any time, such as exercise your right to object the basis of legitimate interest or withdraw your consent by clicking on the 'manage cookies' button  in our website footer or 'manage personal data' button under the 'support and legal' section in our mobile app.cookie policyprivacy statementhow and why we process personal datause precise geolocation data. actively scan device characteristics for identification. store and/or access information on a device. personalised advertising and content, advertising and content measurement, audience research and services development. 
        view all partners and exercise your right to object to legitimate interest

violations.title: Pre-consent Tracking Script Execution
violations.description: Tracking scripts executed before user consent obtained
violations.businessImpact: Unlawful processing of personal data, potential fines up to €20M
violations.remediation: Implement consent-gated script loading using CMP integration

violations.title: Pre-consent Third-party Requests
violations.description: Third-party tracking requests initiated before consent
violations.businessImpact: Data sharing without legal basis, potential GDPR fines
violations.remediation: Implement server-side consent verification for third-party integrations

violations.title: Consent Bypass Vulnerability
violations.description: Technical methods detected to bypass consent mechanism
violations.businessImpact: Systematic GDPR violations, potential criminal liability
violations.remediation: Implement server-side consent validation and audit trails

recommendations.action: Implement consent-gated loading for all tracking technologies

legalAnalysis.legalRisk: HIGH - Fundamental consent violations detected. Immediate remediation required.
legalAnalysis.regulatoryAction: Regulatory investigation risk if user complaints filed. Priority remediation advised.
legalAnalysis.fineExposure: Up to €20M or 4% of annual turnover for systematic consent violations
